      • warnUser

        public static final void warnUser(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser issuer,
                                  sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser warnUser,
                                  long warnTime,
                                  java.lang.String reason)
        Warns the user of the given message for a reason.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer of the command. This will be the bot if this parameter is null.
        warnUser - the IUser reference of the user to be warned.
        warnTime - the time the warn was issued, in milliseconds.
        reason - the reason a warn was issued as a String.

      • muteUser

        public static final void muteUser(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser issuer,
                                  sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser muteUser,
                                  long muteTime,
                                  int muteDuration,
                                  java.lang.String reason)
        Mutes the user of the given message for a reason.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer of the command. This will be the bot if this parameter is null.
        muteUser - the IUser reference of the user to be muted.
        muteTime - the time the mute was issued, in milliseconds.
        muteDuration - the amount of time the user will be unable to chat, in seconds.
        reason - the reason a mute was issued as a String.

      • unmuteUser

        public static final void unmuteUser(sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser issuer,
                                    sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IUser user)
        Unmutes the given user.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer of the command. This will be the bot if this parameter is null.
        user - the user to be muted as an IUser object.

                                  long kickTime,
                                  java.lang.String reason)
        Kicks the user of the given message for a reason.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer of the command. This will be the bot if this parameter is null.
        kickUser - the IUser reference of the user to be kicked.
        kickTime - the time the kick was issued, in milliseconds.
        reason - the reason a kick was issued as a String.

                                 long banTime,
                                 java.lang.String reason)
        Bans the user of the given message for a reason.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the issuer of the command. This will be the bot if this parameter is null.
        banUser - the IUser reference of the user to be banned.
        banTime - the time the ban was issued, in milliseconds.
        reason - the reason a ban was issued as a String.
